Detailed Features.0:
True Color Enhancement
With real time intelligent true colour enhancement technology and a ultra wide colour spectrum, every pixel is enhanced to re-create the original image as intended. Producing realistic skin tones and outstanding contrast.
Freeview is the New Zealand free-to-air platform for TV and radio, we exist so that all New Zealanders can enjoy live TV and record, subscription-free. Over a million kiwi homes already enjoy great RV and movies made right here in New Zealand and from around the world, free with Freeview. Freeview is built into KONIC TV'S.
Detailed Features.1:
Watch and enjoy - Endless content for endless enjoyment
Access Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, LG Channels and YouTube to choose form the latest movies, TV shows, documentaries and live sports all in one place.
Detailed Features.2:
A TV built for your business
Display advertising content and share your business' brand alongside regular TV programming with Samsung's Pro TV BED-H. Offering 4K UHD picture quality and flexible functionality with simple operation, the Pro TV is an ideal display solution for a wide range of business needs.
Detailed Features.3:
75" SERIES 692
KONIC 75" Widescreen Android System Smart Television, featuring an elegant slim frame design with Dolby Sound to let you enjoy your viewing with fewer distractions , clear and realistic audio and a more immersive experience. You will never get bored with endless streaming and content options including Netflix, YouTube and Prime Video etc.
- 4K Display Resolution
- Chromecast Built in
- Netflix Built in
- Freeview Built in
- Android 9.0 System
- Dolby Sound
- Slim line Bezel Design
- Voice Assistant

Detailed Features.12:
alpha 8 AI Processor 4K - Definitive intelligence at its core
See intense detail and definition, for an experience that can feel as natural as real life. Our advanced a8 AI Processor 4K* automatically optimises audio and picture quality for an exhilarating viewing experience.
*Image quality dependent on source material.
  QNED Colour - Vibrance in every pixel
Detailed Features.13:
NQ4 AI Gen2 Processor - Feel the full power of AI in 4K
Our NQ4 AI Gen2 Processor creates an breathtaking 4K experience. Powered by 20 AI neural networks, upscaling technology optimises* picture and sound into a 4K experience when you use streaming services, play video games or watch live sports. And with unique technologies like perceptional colour mapping and OLED brightness booster, you watch in stunning brightness, colour, contrast and detail.
Detailed Features.15:
NQ4 AI Gen2 Processor - Feel the full power of AI in 4K
Samsung's AI powered 4K processor creates one of our best 4K experiences. Our 4K AI Upscaling technology powered by 20 AI neural networks transforms content into near 4K picture quality*. Our NQ4 AI Gen2 Processor optimises both picture and sound to deliver a experience whether you are using streaming apps, playing your favourite video games* or watching live sports.
